name: Mizu (levigideon)
description:
Hello and welcome to Mizu.

Mizu is an arcade-like rollerblading game inspired by Aggressive Inline, THPS, Shred Sauce, and many other incredibly fun action sports games of the last few decades.

Featuring:

  • 1 level
  • Grinds
  • Spins
  • Grabs
  • Character Customization
  • Much more planned!

Mizu is currently under active development. For this game that means that things are still in a bit of a sandbox phase, and you may encounter unexpected behavior. All that considered we thought it was a lot of fun. Things will be changing (hopefully for the better) and occasionally breaking unexpectedly during the early-access phase. Understand you are purchasing a work in progress, as well as future updates. The price will increase as bugs are worked out and the game is built up.

Mizu is being built with help and inspiration from a large, loosely knit community of people who love to rollerblade.

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/2BF5ya8fsz
Follow us on IG: https://www.instagram.com/playmizu/
